APP-R.BK.summary: Applicad Public Company Limited sells computer programs and provides maintenance services for computer programs. The company offers computer software for engineering, construction, and architecture services; computer and spare parts; and machines and equipment, as well as materials and other products. It offers education solution and other related services, as well as designs and manufactures industrial parts and prototypes. In addition, the company distributes AutoCAD drawing, 3D pipe drawing, and 3D software in industrial design. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HUMAN-R.BK.summary: Humanica Public Company Limited provides various human resource services and solutions in Thailand, Singapore, Japan, and Malaysia. It operates through Human Resources Solutions and Financial Solutions segments. The company offers Humatrix, a human resource and payroll management solution for mid to large corporations, including manufacturing, hospitality, healthcare, restaurants, and retail. It also offers human resource outsourcing and payroll services; enterprise resource planning and implementation services; payroll outsourcing services; P2P lending platform; and business consulting services to business optimization, business transformation, and business expansion. In addition, the company provides design, develops content, and creating educational solutions, including sale of mobile based learning management solutions; business application of systems management, human resource, and payroll programs; and distributes technologies, including record time such as time recording machines, ace scanners, fingerprint scanners, and hand card machines, etc. Further, it engages in the development and sale of human resource solutions software, as well as provides property management services. The company provides accounting and financial services, which consists of managing accounting information, financial planning advisory, accounting, financial management, and tax services. It also offers brokerage services to provide cutting-edge platforms for employee welfare management, such as healthcare and wellness, as well as operates as a comprehensive community for employees. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRCP-R.BK.long_name: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited
IRCP-R.BK.summary: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and rendering system development services of information technology, network information, and telecommunication information systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Project Business and Non-Project Business. It provides telecommunication network to connect points to points via fiber optic and wireless technologies, such as DWDM, SDH, Multiplexer, wireless, and broadband; next generation network solutions to link public telephone network with IP network that include VOIP, VDO, instant messaging, etc.; soft switch technology solutions; mobile telephone network solutions; FTTx networking total solutions; and 3G and LTE services. The company also offers solutions for enterprise, such as enterprise resource planning, enterprise application integration, data warehouse and business intelligence, custom application development, and implementation services. In addition, it provides software replication and pad printing services; and digital broadcasting solutions, including headend equipment, television transmission systems, new media, and content production solutions, as well as designs, builds, and installs digital TV system equipment for television and broadcasting industry. Additionally, it provides project management and maintenance services for integrated radio and television broadcasting systems. International Research Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NETBAY-R.BK.summary: Netbay Public Company Limited creates, designs, and develops digital business technology platform and omni channel connectivity gateway solutions for the electronic business transaction exchange in the field of trading. The company provides digital business services, which include e-customs; customs e-payment; e-manifest, a paperless report for imports/ exports system; e-express; electronic transaction reporting gateway for financial institutes; customer due diligence gateways; and software development and cloud computing services. Its software as a service comprise data center, disaster recovery center, operating software system, which supports the electronic transaction reporting gateway, networking systems, and protection of information services. In addition, the company acts as electronic data interchange provider for electronic transaction reporting and audit report services for life insurance, non-life insurance, securities, asset management, and finance companies, as well as financial institutions and banks. Further, it offers electronics bank guarantee data interchange services between banks and Comptroller General's Department. It serves international and domestic trade, and service sectors; manufacturers, exporters, importers, freight forwarders, shipping agents, customs brokers, terminal operators, transportation service providers, and logistics and supply chain communities; ocean line, air, and express couriers; and the Thai Chamber of Commerce and Board of Trade of Thailand. Netbay Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NEWS.BK.long_name: News Network Corporation Public Company Limited
NEWS.BK.summary: News Network Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells software in Thailand. The company is also involved in procuring hardware products; distributing and servicing technology products; providing internet, mass communication, programs production, system integrator, and new media services, as well as news; and trading and servicing examining tools and equipment in occupational health activities. In addition, it provides information through online system and electronic media, as well as publishing production and distribution services; and distributes books, as well as distribution and installation services for environment projects. The company was formerly known as Solution Corner (1998) Public Company Limited and changed its name to News Network Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2015. News Network Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
